price: 82. Yalli cakki diggi haah arcisah, isi qangor kee isi astootit deedalak amo kaa ciggiilisak, umeynit woh tanqibe way.
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
